chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: Type

Goal:
forall (C : Ensemble partial_WO) (c : chain partial_WO_ord C) (WO : partial_WO), In C WO -> partial_WO_ord WO (partial_WO_chain_ub C c)

Premises:
Record partial_WO_ord (WO1 WO2 : partial_WO) : Prop := Build_partial_WO_ord { pwo_S_incl : Included (pwo_S WO1) (pwo_S WO2); pwo_restriction : forall x y : T, In (pwo_S WO1) x -> In (pwo_S WO1) y -> pwo_R WO1 x y <-> pwo_R WO2 x y; pwo_downward_closed : forall x y : T, In (pwo_S WO1) y -> In (pwo_S WO2) x -> pwo_R WO2 x y -> In (pwo_S WO1) x } Arguments Build_partial_WO_ord _ _ _ (_ _)%function_scope
Ensemble = fun U : Type => U -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments Ensemble _%type_scope
chain = fun (T : Type) (R : relation T) (S : Ensemble T) => forall x y : T, In S x -> In S y -> R x y \/ R y x : forall T : Type, relation T -> Ensemble T -> Prop Arguments chain {T}%type_scope
In = fun (U : Type) (A : Ensemble U) (x : U) => A x : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> U -> Prop Arguments In {U}%type_scope
partial_WO_chain_ub : forall C : Ensemble partial_WO, chain partial_WO_ord C -> partial_WO
Record partial_WO : Type := Build_partial_WO { pwo_S : Ensemble T; pwo_R : relation T; pwo_R_lives_on_S : forall x y : T, pwo_R x y -> In pwo_S x /\ In pwo_S y; pwo_wo : well_order (restriction_relation pwo_R pwo_S) } Arguments Build_partial_WO _ _ _%function_scope
Union_intror : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (x : U), In C x -> In (Union B C) x
Intersection_intro : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (x : U), In B x -> In C x -> In (Intersection B C) x
Constructive_sets.Intersection_inv : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (x : U), In (Intersection B C) x -> In B x /\ In C x
Constructive_sets.Union_inv : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (x : U), In (Union B C) x -> In B x \/ In C x
Disjoint_intro : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U), (forall x : U, ~ In (Intersection B C) x) -> Disjoint B C
Disjoint_sind : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (P : SProp), ((forall x : U, ~ In (Intersection B C) x) -> P) -> Disjoint B C -> P
Disjoint_rect : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (P : Type), ((forall x : U, ~ In (Intersection B C) x) -> P) -> Disjoint B C -> P
Disjoint_ind : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (P : Prop), ((forall x : U, ~ In (Intersection B C) x) -> P) -> Disjoint B C -> P
Disjoint_rec : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (P : Set), ((forall x : U, ~ In (Intersection B C) x) -> P) -> Disjoint B C -> P
Inductive Union (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) : Ensemble U := Union_introl : forall x : U, In B x -> In (Union B C) x | Union_intror : forall x : U, In C x -> In (Union B C) x Arguments Union {U}%type_scope Arguments Union_introl _%type_scope Arguments Union_intror _%type_scope
Inductive Intersection (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) : Ensemble U := Intersection_intro : forall x : U, In B x -> In C x -> In (Intersection B C) x Arguments Intersection {U}%type_scope Arguments Intersection_intro _%type_scope
Union_introl : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (x : U), In B x -> In (Union B C) x
Intersection_sind : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (P : U -> SProp), (forall x : U, In B x -> In C x -> P x) -> forall u : U, Intersection B C u -> P u
Intersection_ind : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (P : U -> Prop), (forall x : U, In B x -> In C x -> P x) -> forall u : U, Intersection B C u -> P u
Included = fun (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) => forall x : U, In B x -> In C x : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> Ensemble U -> Prop Arguments Included {U}%type_scope
Union_ind : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (P : U -> Prop), (forall x : U, In B x -> P x) -> (forall x : U, In C x -> P x) -> forall u : U, Union B C u -> P u
Union_sind : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (P : U -> SProp), (forall x : U, In B x -> P x) -> (forall x : U, In C x -> P x) -> forall u : U, Union B C u -> P u
pwo_S_incl : forall WO1 WO2 : partial_WO, partial_WO_ord WO1 WO2 -> Included (pwo_S WO1) (pwo_S WO2)
pwo_downward_closed : forall WO1 WO2 : partial_WO, partial_WO_ord WO1 WO2 -> forall x y : T, In (pwo_S WO1) y -> In (pwo_S WO2) x -> pwo_R WO2 x y -> In (pwo_S WO1) x
Inductive Disjoint (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) : Prop := Disjoint_intro : (forall x : U, ~ In (Intersection B C) x) -> Disjoint B C Arguments Disjoint {U}%type_scope Arguments Disjoint_intro _%type_scope _ _ _%function_scope
Setminus = fun (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (x : U) => In B x /\ ~ In C x : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> Ensemble U -> Ensemble U Arguments Setminus {U}%type_scope
Strict_Included = fun (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) => Included B C /\ B <> C : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> Ensemble U -> Prop Arguments Strict_Included {U}%type_scope
Same_set = fun (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) => Included B C /\ Included C B : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> Ensemble U -> Prop Arguments Same_set {U}%type_scope
pwo_restriction : forall WO1 WO2 : partial_WO, partial_WO_ord WO1 WO2 -> forall x y : T, In (pwo_S WO1) x -> In (pwo_S WO1) y -> pwo_R WO1 x y < -> pwo_R WO2 x y
Powerset_facts.Distributivity' : forall (U : Type) (A B C : Ensemble U), Union A (Intersection B C) = Intersection (Union A B) (Union A C)
pwo_R_lives_on_S : forall (p : partial_WO) (x y : T), pwo_R p x y -> In (pwo_S p) x /\ In (pwo_S p) y
ZornsLemma : forall R : relation ?T, order R -> (forall S : Ensemble ?T, chain R S -> exists x : ?T, forall y : ?T, In S y -> R y x) -> exists x : ?T, maximal R x where ?T : [T : Type |- Type]
Build_partial_WO_ord : forall WO1 WO2 : partial_WO, Included (pwo_S WO1) (pwo_S WO2) -> (forall x y : T, In (pwo_S WO1) x -> In (pwo_S WO1) y -> pwo_R WO1 x y <-> pwo_R WO2 x y) -> (forall x y : T, In (pwo_S WO1) y -> In (pwo_S WO2) x -> pwo_R WO2 x y -> In (pwo_S WO1) x) -> partial_WO_ord WO1 WO2
Image.In_Image_elim : forall (A : Ensemble ?U) (f : ?U -> ?V), Image.injective f -> forall x : ?U, In (Image.Im A f) (f x) -> In A x where ?U : [T : Type |- Type] ?V : [T : Type |- Type]
Image.Im_def : forall (X : Ensemble ?U) (f : ?U -> ?V) (x : ?U), In X x -> In (Image.Im X f) (f x) where ?U : [T : Type |- Type] ?V : [T : Type |- Type]
